content.p: The aim of the network is to promote the University of Nottingham as a Centre of Excellence in evidence-based healthcare and veterinary medicine. We are a unique community made up of experienced academic researchers, clinical and veterinary practitioners and information scientists. We are linked to the major global evidence based organisations (Cochrane, JBI, GRADE) and have expertise in the full range of evidence synthesis methodologies with particular topic expertise in the following areas: Objectives and activities News The University of Nottingham Nottingham, NG7 2UH email: ms-GEN4health@nottingham.ac.uk
